questions: Is there a shrub in the scene?
Is the shrub short in shape?
Is there a paperweight in the scene?
Is the paperweight in the shape of a pyramid?
model_output:
yes The background shows green foliage which is characteristic of a shrub.
yes The shrub appears to have a cluster of leaves close to the ground, suggesting it is short in shape.
yes There is an object resembling a paperweight present in the scene.
yes The paperweight clearly has a pyramidal shape with flat triangular faces and a square base.
yes The surface of the paperweight reflects light in a manner consistent with metallic material.
